name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: Kung Pao Chicken is a spicy Szechuan dish made with diced chicken, peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers. It is typically stir-fried and served over rice.

name: Egg Rolls
description: Egg Rolls are a popular appetizer made with a crispy fried wrapper filled with chopped vegetables, meat, and sometimes shrimp. They are often served with sweet and sour sauce.

name: Hot and Sour Soup
description: Hot and Sour Soup is a classic Chinese soup made with chicken or pork broth, mushrooms, tofu, bamboo shoots, and a mixture of hot and sour flavors. It is often garnished with green onions and white pepper.

name: Beef and Broccoli
description: Beef and Broccoli is a stir-fry dish made with thinly sliced beef, broccoli, and a savory brown sauce. It is often served over rice or noodles.
